text: The Khalji dynasty was a Muslim dynasty of Turkic origin. It ruled large parts of South Asia between 1290 and 1320.Dynastic Chart The Imperial Gazetteer of India, v. 2, p. 368. == References == Category:1290s establishments Category:1320s disestablishments Category:Khalji dynasty Category:History of India Category:History of Pakistan Category:13th-century establishments in Asia Category:14th-century disestablishments in Asia
title: Khalji dynasty
